Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.4H/e {{ModID}}_:
LitD_Music.SunnySideUp
                    /47 29
                    /TravisV 47 34 0 Haley 50 33 0 Emily 48 34 0 Leah 45 33 0 farmer 42 49 2 JeremyTSnail 52 39 1
                    /beginSimultaneousCommand
                        /ignoreCollisions TravisV
                        /ignoreCollisions farmer
                        /ignoreCollisions Leah
                        /ignoreCollisions Haley
                        /ignoreCollisions Emily
                        /ignoreCollisions JeremyTSnail
                        /addTemporaryActor Prop.Travis_Painting 16 32 47 33 0 false character
                        /addTemporaryActor Prop.Haley_Painting 16 32 50 32 0 false character
                        /addTemporaryActor Prop.Leah_Painting 16 32 45 32 0 false character
                        /addTemporaryActor Prop.Emily_Painting 16 32 48 33 0 false character
                        /addTemporaryActor 7A.Seagull.3 32 32 26 27 0 false character
                        /addTemporaryActor Prop.Travis_PicnicBlanket 96 64 42 30 0 false character
                        /speed JeremyTSnail 1
                        /advancedMove JeremyTSnail true 3 0 1 3500 -3 0 3 3000
                        /animate 7A.Seagull.3 false true 250 44 45 46 47
                        /animate Emily false true 250 16 17
                        /addConversationTopic LitD_CT_TravisPaintAndSip {{Event Cooldown Length}}
                    /endSimultaneousCommand
                    /skippable
                        
                        /viewport move 0 1 5000        
                        /pause 500
                        /faceDirection Leah 1
                        /emote Leah 56
                    /speak Leah "Alright, mine's done.#$b#I don't think I quite got the path right, but it is what it is.$h"
                        /stopAnimation Emily 12
                        /pause 50
                        /emote TravisV 212 true
                        /faceDirection TravisV 3 true
                        /pause 100
                        /faceDirection Haley 3
                        /pause 300
                    /speak TravisV "I for one think it's fantastic.#$b#It looks like the path to me, so I'd say it's a win.$l"
                        /emote Leah 256
                        /faceDirection TravisV 1 true
                        /pause 200
                        /emote Emily 272 true
                        /showFrame Emily 48
                        /jump Emily
                        /pause 1200
                        /faceDirection Emily 2
                    /speak Emily "Yours also came out great Trav, it's soooo pretty.$h"
                        /emote Haley 12
                    /speak Haley "Emily, he paints that EVERY single time.$u"
                        /faceDirection Emily 1 true
                        /emote Emily 8
                    /speak Emily "So? That doesn't make it any less pretty.#$b#Your cow portrait also came out amazing!$h"
                        /animate Emily false true 200 18 19
                        /pause 100
                    /textAboveHead Emily "We all did great!"
                        /pause 400
                        /jump Emily
                        /pause 300
                        /animate TravisV false true 250 30 31
                        /pause 2000
                        /emote Leah 32 true
                        /pause 500
                        /emote Haley 40
                        /pause 200
                    /speak Haley "Girl, you just threw random paint splatters on the canvas.$s"
                        /pause 100 
                        /emote Leah 240 true
                        /pause 100
                        /stopAnimation Emily 12
                        /pause 100
                        /stopAnimation TravisV 32
                    /speak Leah "I think you just don't understand what she was going for.$7"
                        /pause 100
                        /showframe TravisV 28 true
                    /textAboveHead TravisV "Agreed."
                        /pause 1800
                        /showFrame Haley 0
                        /pause 200
                        /showFrame Haley 16
                        /pause 200
                        /showFrame Haley 17
                        /emote Haley 12
                    /speak Haley "Uhg. Well then can you explain what I'm not understanding?$s"
                        /faceDirection TravisV 2
                        /pause 100
                        /showFrame TravisV 32
                        /pause 50
                        /faceDirection Emily 3 true
                        /pause 50
                        /showFrame Haley 12
                    /speak TravisV "Well clearly...$l"
                        /emote TravisV 244 true
                        /animate TravisV false true 250 38 39
                        /pause 400
                    /speak TravisV "Often in art, the color green represents the emotion envy.$6#$b#As the base canvas is green, the giant blue splotches represent the never ending desire for growth a mega corporation, such as Joja, craves.$a#$b#It will devour everything useful to it in its path, leaving nothing behind.$18#$b#The green could also symbolize the thoughtless destruction of nature through consumption, but that's another tangent all together.$6#$b#The orange splotches must represent the warm creative spirit, fighting back against the machine in small yet impactful ways!$12#$b#Yeah. That's definitely it!$13"
                        /pause 100
                        /animate Emily false true 200 48 49
                        /pause 200
                        /emote Leah 224 true
                        /pause 200
                        /textAboveHead Haley "*snickers*"
                        /pause 2300
                    /speak TravisV "Hey, what're y'all laughing at?$a"
                        /pause 100
                        /showFrame Haley 0
                        /pause 200
                        /showFrame Haley 16
                        /pause 200
                        /showFrame Haley 17
                    /speak Haley "You're doing the thing.$13"
                        /stopAnimation Emily 12
                    /speak TravisV "The...?$6#$b#Oh!$u"
                        /showFrame Haley 12
                        /pause 50
                        /stopAnimation TravisV 36
                        /pause 1000
                        /emote TravisV 240 true
                        /pause 300
                        /faceDirection TravisV 0
                        /pause 1000
                        /emote Emily 28 true
                        /pause 100
                        /emote Haley 40 true
                        /pause 100
                        /emote Leah 8
                        /playSound doorClose
                        /advancedMove farmer false 6 0 0 -13 4 10 
                    /speak Emily "That wasn't it at all, but I appreciate the thoughtful interpretation.$h"
                        /showFrame TravisV 28
                    /textAboveHead TravisV "Oh."
                        /pause 1500
                        /emote Haley 12
                    /speak Haley "Are you serious? I had literally JUST understood it.$u"
                        /proceedPosition farmer
                        /emote farmer 8
                        /faceDirection TravisV 2 true
                        /pause 50
                        /faceDirection Haley 2 true
                        /pause 30
                        /faceDirection Leah 2 true
                        /pause 15
                        /faceDirection Emily 2 true
                        /pause 30
                        /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.4H.Reaction.{{Trav4HReaction}}
                    /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.4H.Reaction.1:
resetVariable
                    /speak TravisV "Aye! If it ain't @.$h#$b#Hope you've been takin' care of yourself toiling away on that farm.$l"
                    /quickQuestion # Sure have been, thanks for asking! # I have been, but maybe I could use a personal farmhand... <
                        (break)pause 100
                            \emote farmer 56
                        (break)pause 100
                            \action IncrementStat LitD.TravisFlirt 1
                            \emote farmer 20
                        \speak TravisV "Aye? Is that so...$24#$b#You happen to be hiring?$9"
                            \emote Haley 56 true
                            \faceDirection Haley 3 true
                            \pause 30
                            \emote Leah 8 true
                            \faceDirection Leah 1 true
                            \pause 15
                            \emote Emily 32 true
                            \faceDirection Emily 3 true
                            \pause 2000
                            \faceDirection Haley 2 true
                            \pause 30
                            \faceDirection Leah 2 true
                            \pause 15
                            \faceDirection Emily 2 true
                            \pause 30
                        /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.4H.Cont
                    /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.4H.Reaction.2:
resetVariable
                        /pause 600
                        /emote TravisV 280 true
                        /jump TravisV
                        /pause 500
                    /speak TravisV "Aye! If it ain't @.$10#$b#I'll have ya know I kept this smile warm for ya.$9"
                    /quickQuestion # That's cool. # Seems we've warmed each other up, haven't we? <
                        (break)action AddMail Current LitD_M_RejectedTravis received
                            \emote TravisV 28 true
                            \shake TravisV 1000
                        \speak TravisV "Well, no uh, it's uh. Warm. Yeah.$29#$b#(Shoot. Haley I think I misread the vibes.)$30"
                            \textAboveHead Haley "Yeaahhh..."
                            \faceDirection Haley 3 true
                            \pause 30
                            \emote Leah 8 true
                            \faceDirection Leah 1 true
                            \pause 15
                            \emote Emily 28 true
                            \faceDirection Emily 3 true
                            \pause 2000
                            \faceDirection Haley 2 true
                            \pause 30
                            \faceDirection Leah 2 true
                            \pause 15
                            \faceDirection Emily 2 true
                            \pause 30
                            \speak TravisV "Er. Anyways.$20"
                        (break)action IncrementStat LitD.TravisFlirt 1
                            \showFrame TravisV 33
                            \emote TravisV 280 true
                            \pause 500
                            \emote farmer 20
                            \pause 500
                            \emote Haley 56 true
                            \faceDirection Haley 3 true
                            \pause 30
                            \emote Leah 8 true
                            \faceDirection Leah 1 true
                            \pause 15
                            \emote Emily 32 true
                            \faceDirection Emily 3 true
                            \pause 2000
                            \faceDirection Haley 2 true
                            \pause 30
                            \faceDirection Leah 2 true
                            \pause 15
                            \faceDirection Emily 2 true
                            \pause 30
                            \showFrame TravisV 0
                    /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.4H.Cont
                    /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.4H.Cont:
resetVariable
                    /speak Emily "Hiya farmer! We're having a paint and sip.#$b#Wanna see what we've made?$h"
                        /emote farmer 56
                        /faceDirection Haley 3 true
                        /emote Haley 244
                    /speak Haley "Oh, we should so have @ vote on which painting they like the best.$13"
                        /faceDirection Emily 1 true
                        /emote Emily 12
                    /speak Emily "This is supposed to be for fun, not a contest!$s"
                        /animate TravisV false true 250 30 31
                        /faceDirection Leah 1 true
                        /emote Leah 256
                    /speak Leah "I don't think it would hurt anything. Let's see what @ thinks.$h"
                        /pause 100
                        /faceDirection Emily 3 true
                        /emote Emily 40
                        /pause 100
                        /textAboveHead Emily "Fiiiiine."
                        /pause 100
                        /stopAnimation TravisV 0
                        /pause 1000
                        /emote Leah 56 true
                        /advancedMove Leah false -2 0 1 10
                        /pause 100
                        /emote Haley 56 true
                        /advancedMove Haley false 2 0 3 10
                        /pause 50
                        /advancedMove Emily false 1 0 0 2 4 10
                        /pause 30
                        /emote TravisV 56 true
                        /advancedMove TravisV false 0 2 4 10
                    /beginSimultaneousCommand
                        /proceedPosition Emily
                        /proceedPosition TravisV
                        /proceedPosition Leah
                    /endSimultaneousCommand
                        /advancedMove farmer false 0 -2 -3 0 0 -1 4 10
                        /pause 3000
                        /emote Leah 56 true
                    /message "Leah painted a nature scene, inspired by the forked path behind you."
                        /advancedMove farmer false 0 1 2 0 4 10
                        /pause 1500
                        /emote TravisV 60 true
                    /message "Travis painted a moon overlooking a grassy field... you recall his house is full of variations of this exact painting."
                        /advancedMove farmer false 1 0 4 10
                        /pause 800
                        /emote Emily 272 true
                    /message "Emily's painting is a freeform haphazard splatter of colorful paint."
                        /advancedMove farmer false 2 0 0 -1 4 10
                        /pause 1400
                        /emote Haley 32 true
                    /message "Haley painted a cow. It's absolutely adorable!"
                        /advancedMove farmer false 0 2 -2 0 0 1 4 10
                        /pause 3000
                        /advancedMove Leah false 2 0 2 10
                        /pause 100
                        /advancedMove Haley false -2 0 2 10
                        /pause 50
                        /advancedMove Emily false 0 -2 -1 0 2 10
                        /pause 30
                        /advancedMove TravisV false 0 -2 2 10
                    /beginSimultaneousCommand
                        /proceedPosition Emily
                        /proceedPosition TravisV
                        /proceedPosition Leah
                    /endSimultaneousCommand
                    /speak TravisV "So, which one's yer favorite?$11"
                    /quickQuestion Vote for your favorite painting! #Leah's landscape is stunning! # Travis's painting, it's so serene. # Emily's abstract splatter is out of this world! # Haley's! Cows are so cute. # I think they're all amazing! # Travis's piece painted its way into my heart... <
                        (break)action AddMail Current LitD_M_VotedForLeah received
                                \emote Leah 256 true\jump Leah\pause 200
                            \speak Leah "Oh! Thank you!$h#$b#I honestly didn't expect that. I fought with that path for an entire hour.$s"
                                \emote TravisV 280 true
                                \faceDirection TravisV 3
                            \speak TravisV "Hey! I told you the path looked fine, you're being too hard on yourself.$11"
                                \emote Leah 32
                            \speak Leah "Yeah, you're right. It's just a path.#$b#They're wiggly and weird, so it's going to look weird no matter how I do it.$h"
                            \textAboveHead TravisV "That's the spirit!"
                                \pause 3000
                                \faceDirection TravisV 2
                        (break)action AddMail Current LitD_M_VotedForTravis received
                                \emote TravisV 280 true\jump TravisV\pause 200
                            \speak TravisV "Heh! Why thank you. This style of painting is my specialty.$12"
                                \faceDirection Haley 3 true
                                \emote Haley 12
                            \speak Haley "What? You can't just paint the same thing over and over again and WIN.$u"
                                \animate TravisV false true 250 30 31
                                \emote TravisV 236
                            \speak TravisV "I sure can and will. That's how the industry works, girl.$8"
                                \stopAnimation TravisV 0
                                \faceDirection Haley 2 true
                                \emote Haley 12
                        (break)action AddMail Current LitD_M_VotedForEmily received
                                \emote Emily 272 true\jump Emily\pause 200
                            \speak Emily "Oh! Yippee! I'm glad you think so, @.#$b#I poured my whole art and soul into this one!$h"
                                \faceDirection Haley 3 true
                                \emote Haley 12 true
                            \speak Haley "What? It's literally JUST a paint splatter.$u"
                                \faceDirection TravisV 1
                            \speak TravisV "I honestly just want to know what it means. Keeping secrets ye are, Emily.$6"
                                \pause 30
                                \faceDirection Leah 1 true
                                \emote Leah 244
                            \speak Leah "I'm guessing it doesn't have a meaning, it's symbolic of the freedom of self expression."
                                \faceDirection TravisV 1 true
                                \pause 200
                                \emote Emily 272 true
                                \showFrame Emily 48\jump Emily\pause 1200
                                \faceDirection Emily 2
                            \speak Emily "Eeeeexactly!$h"
                                \showFrame TravisV 33
                                \emote TravisV 240 true
                            \speak TravisV "Oh come ooooon. That's it?$a"
                                \pause 100
                                \emote Haley 12
                            \speak Haley "I can't believe this. I actually liked your interpretation better, Travis.$s"
                                \emote TravisV 60 true
                                \pause 50
                                \faceDirection Emily 2 true
                                \pause 100
                                \faceDirection Haley 2 true
                                \pause 75
                                \faceDirection Leah 2 true
                                \showFrame TravisV 0
                        (break)action AddMail Current LitD_M_VotedForHaley received
                                \emote Haley 56 true\jump Haley\pause 200
                            \speak Haley "The right choice, obviously! I painted it from a picture I took recently.$h#$b#I'm not much of a painter, so I'm pretty proud of it if I do say so myself.$11"
                                \faceDirection TravisV 1 true
                                \emote TravisV 280
                            \speak TravisV "As you should be. Cows are pretty dang cute.$h"
                                \faceDirection Haley 3 true
                                \emote Haley 212
                            \speak Haley "Glad you think so, because that's the only correct take."
                                \faceDirection Haley 2 true
                                \pause 100
                                \faceDirection TravisV 2 true
                        (break)action AddMail Current LitD_M_VotedForAll received
                                \emote Emily 272 true\jump Emily\pause 200
                                \animate TravisV false true 250 30 31
                                \pause 300
                                \emote Leah 56 true
                                \pause 1000
                                \emote Haley 12 true
                                \pause 1000
                                \stopAnimation TravisV 0
                            \speak Haley "...Coward.$u"
                        (break)action AddMail Current LitD_M_VotedForTravisFlirty received
                                \action IncrementStat LitD.TravisFlirt 1
                                \stopAnimation TravisV 33
                                \emote TravisV 280
                            \speak TravisV "Oh ho ho. Keep saying things like that, and you might sketch your way into mine.$9"
                                \emote Haley 12 true
                                \faceDirection Haley 3 true
                                \pause 100
                                \emote Leah 60 true
                                \faceDirection Leah 1 true
                                \pause 200
                                \emote Emily 32 true
                                \faceDirection Emily 3
                            \speak Haley "Oh, I see how it is. The vote was rigged this whole time.$u"
                                \animate TravisV false true 250 30 31
                                \emote TravisV 236
                            \speak TravisV "Contests usually are, girl.$24"
                                \emote Haley 12
                                \pause 50
                                \faceDirection Emily 2 true
                                \pause 100
                                \faceDirection Haley 2 true
                                \pause 75
                                \faceDirection Leah 2 true
                                \stopAnimation TravisV 0
                            /pause 1000
                        /speak TravisV "We're probably gonna keep paintin' a while if you wanted to stick around.$11"
                            /emote Haley 40
                            /emote Haley 244
                        /speak Haley "Yeah, we're going to use Travis as a canvas. You don't want to miss this."
                            /showFrame TravisV 36
                            /shake TravisV 1000
                            /jump TravisV
                        /textAboveHead TravisV "Wait what?"
                            /pause 2500
                            /animate Emily false true 250 48 49
                            /pause 500
                            /faceDirection Leah 1 true
                            /emote Leah 224 true
                            /pause 50
                            /faceDirection Haley 3
                            /emote Haley 236 true
                            /pause 50
                            /emote farmer 56
                            /pause 1500
                            /globalFade 0.012
                            /viewport -1000 -1000
                        /message "The girls spent a half an hour chasing Travis around with a paint brush.#...He probably deserved it."
                    /end

For once we're on the same page.$u"*/
